patterns: Hello
Hi
Hey there
Good morning/afternoon/evening
responses: Hello!  How can I help you today?
Hi there!  What would you like to learn about?
Welcome!  I'm happy to assist you. What can I do for you today?
Good morning! It's a great day to start learning. What can I help you with?
Hey there! What can I answer for you today?
Ready to explore some new courses?  Let me know if you have any questions!
Welcome back!  What can I help you with today?
Hi!  I see you're interested in {topic}.  Can I answer any questions you have?
Hello!  I'm Bard, your friendly course assistant.  What can I do for you?
Excited to be here with you!  What learning goals can I help you achieve?

patterns: Goodbye
Bye
See you later
Thanks
Thank you
I'm done
Have a good one
responses: Goodbye!  I hope I was helpful today.  Feel free to come back if you have any other questions.
Bye!  Have a great day!
See you later!  Happy learning!
You're welcome!  Glad I could help.  Don't hesitate to ask if you have any more questions.
Thanks for stopping by!  I'm always here to assist you with your learning journey.
No problem!  I'm happy to help anytime.  Let me know if you need anything else.
Have a good one as well!  I hope you have a productive day.

patterns: Thanks
Thank you
Appreciate it
That's helpful
You're the best
Great
Awesome
responses: You're welcome!  Glad I could help.  Don't hesitate to ask if you have any more questions.
Happy to hear that!  I'm here to assist you with your learning journey in any way I can.
No problem at all!  That's what I'm here for.  Let me know if you need anything else.
Glad I could be helpful!  Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Aww, thanks!  I'm always happy to help in any way I can.
That's great to hear!  I'm glad I could be of service.
Awesome!  If you have any other questions, feel free to ask!

patterns: What is this platform about?
Tell me more about yourselves
What do you offer?
What courses do you have?
Who created you?
What's the story behind your development?
Are you affiliated with any particular organization?
What are your goals?
How do you stay up-to-date with the latest information?
Can I learn more about your team?
responses: We are an ed-tech platform that provides high-quality online courses to help you develop in-demand skills.  We offer a wide range of courses in various fields.
We're passionate about education and helping people achieve their learning goals.  We offer a variety of courses designed to be informative and engaging.
We were created by a team of engineers and educators with a mission to make learning accessible and effective for everyone.
Our development is an ongoing process! We're constantly learning and evolving based on user feedback and the latest advancements in technology.
We operate independently, focusing on providing a comprehensive and unbiased learning experience.
Our primary goal is to empower learners with the knowledge and skills they need to succeed in today's world.
We stay up-to-date by crawling and processing information from a variety of credible sources, and our team of experts continuously refines and improves our content.
Sure!  Our team consists of talented individuals with backgrounds in various disciplines, all working together to create a valuable learning platform.

patterns: Is this course suitable for beginners or advanced users?
Who is this course suitable for?
What skill level is this course designed for?
Can a complete beginner take this course?
Will this course challenge someone with experience?
I have no prior experience in {topic}, can I still enroll?
Is there a basic foundation needed for this course?
How advanced are the concepts covered in this course?
Is this a good course for upskilling in {topic}?
I'm at an intermediate level in {topic}, is this a good fit?
responses: This course caters to both beginners and advanced users. Our curriculum is designed to be adaptable, offering a solid foundation for beginners and allowing experienced learners to deepen their knowledge.
The course is suitable for learners with a variety of skill levels. We provide clear explanations and build upon concepts gradually.
This course is designed to be accessible for beginners. We'll start with the basics and gradually progress to more complex topics.
Absolutely! The course is designed to be beginner-friendly and will equip you with the essential skills in {topic}.
Yes, the course will challenge you by introducing advanced concepts while ensuring a solid understanding of the fundamentals.
Even with no prior experience, you can still benefit from this course. We'll provide a strong foundation to get you started in {topic}.
While no specific prerequisites are required, a basic understanding of {related topic} might be helpful for some concepts.
The course covers a range of concepts, starting from basic principles and progressing to more advanced topics in {topic}.
This course is a great option for upskilling in {topic}. It will help you build on your existing knowledge and gain valuable new skills.
Yes, if you're at an intermediate level in {topic} this course can be a good fit. It will provide a refresher on core concepts and introduce you to more advanced material.

patterns: Can I learn at my own pace?
Is this course self-paced?
Do I need to stick to a specific schedule?
How flexible is the learning schedule?
Can I complete the course on my own time?
I have a busy schedule, can I still manage this course?
Is there a deadline to finish the course?
Can I take breaks in between lessons?
What if I need to revisit a topic later?
Can I go back and review the course material?
responses: Absolutely! The course is designed for self-paced learning. You can progress through the material at your own convenience.
Yes, this is a self-paced course. You can adjust the learning speed to fit your schedule and learning style.
There's no need to stick to a specific schedule. You can access the lessons and complete them whenever works best for you.
The learning schedule is very flexible. You can dedicate as much or as little time as you need each day.
Yes, you can definitely complete the course on your own time. You have full control over your learning pace.
No problem! Even with a busy schedule, the self-paced format allows you to learn in manageable chunks whenever you have some free time.
There is no set deadline for completing the course. You can take your time and learn at your own speed.
Sure, you can take breaks in between lessons as needed. The course material will be available for you to resume whenever you're ready.
Absolutely! If you need to revisit a topic later, you can easily go back and review any lesson or material within the course.
Yes, you can go back and review the course material at any time. All the lessons and resources will be readily available for you to revisit.

patterns: What assignments are there for this course?
Are there any assignments in this course?
When is the next assignment due?
How do I submit my assignments?
Where can I find the assignment instructions?
Can I see a sample assignment?
How are the assignments graded?
How much time do I have to complete an assignment?
Can I get an extension on the assignment deadline?
What happens if I miss an assignment deadline?
responses: This course includes {number} assignments to help you solidify the concepts you learn. You can find them listed in the course modules.
Yes, there are several assignments throughout the course to assess your understanding. They will be clearly marked within the modules.
The due date for the next assignment is {date} at {time}. You can find specific deadlines within each assignment description.
Assignments can be submitted electronically through the course platform. You'll see specific instructions for each assignment.
The assignment instructions are located within each module, along with the corresponding assignment itself.
Unfortunately, we cannot provide sample assignments due to academic integrity reasons. However, the assignment descriptions will give you a clear idea of what's expected.
Assignments are graded based on a set of criteria that will be provided with each assignment. This will help you understand how your work will be evaluated.
The time allotted for each assignment will vary depending on its complexity. You'll find the specific timeframe within the assignment description.

We encourage you to complete assignments on time. However, you can request an extension by contacting your instructor through the course platform. Explain your situation and provide any necessary documentation.
Missing an assignment deadline may affect your overall course grade. It's important to adhere to the deadlines unless you have a valid reason and have secured an extension from your instructor.

patterns: Are there any prerequisites for this course?
Do I need any prior knowledge to take this course?
What are the pre-requisites for this course?
Is there anything I should know before starting this course?
Will I be able to follow along if I haven't taken {previous_course}?
What basic skills do I need for this course?
Is there a recommended course to take before this one?
I'm new to {topic}, can I still enroll?
What background knowledge would be helpful?
What prior experience do I need for this course?
responses: There are no strict prerequisites for this course. However, a basic understanding of {prerequisite_topic} would be beneficial for a smoother learning experience.
No prior knowledge is absolutely required, but some familiarity with {related_topic} might be helpful.
This course doesn't have formal prerequisites, but having some experience in {relevant_field} would be advantageous.
We recommend having a foundational understanding of {prerequisite_concept} before enrolling. This will help you grasp the concepts covered in this course more effectively.

It depends on your prior knowledge of {topic}. If you haven't taken {previous_course}, you might find some sections more challenging. We recommend reviewing the {previous_course} syllabus or key concepts to ensure this course is a good fit.
For this course, it's helpful to have basic skills in {list of skills}. These will serve as a strong foundation for the material you'll learn.
We don't have a mandatory prerequisite course, but we recommend taking {recommended_course} first. It provides a solid introduction to {topic} which will be helpful for this course.
Absolutely! Even if you're new to {topic}, this course is designed to be accessible for beginners. We'll start with the fundamentals and gradually build upon your knowledge.
A basic understanding of {background_knowledge} would be helpful to get the most out of this course. We'll provide an overview of the key concepts, but having some prior exposure would be beneficial.
Having prior experience in {previous_experience} would definitely be an asset. However, the course is designed to be comprehensive and can be followed even without it.

patterns: How long does it take to complete the {course_name} course?
What is the estimated time commitment for this course?
On average, how long does it take to finish this course?
Is this a short course or a long course?
Can I complete this course in a week?
How many hours per week should I dedicate to this course?
Will I have enough time to finish this course with my busy schedule?
Is there a recommended pace for completing this course?
What factors can affect the course completion time?
How long does it typically take for someone to complete all the assignments?
responses: The course duration varies depending on individual learning styles and pace. On average, it takes {estimated_time} to complete.
The time commitment for this course is estimated to be {estimated_time_commitment}. This is a flexible guideline, and you can adjust it based on your learning speed.
On average, students take around {estimated_time} to finish this course. However, the actual duration can vary depending on your learning pace and prior knowledge.
The total length of {course_name} is considered {course_length_descriptor} compared to other courses on our platform.
Completing the course in a week might be challenging, but it depends on your prior knowledge and dedication. The average completion time is {estimated_time}.
The recommended time commitment is {suggested_time_per_week} per week. However, you can adjust this based on your schedule and learning style.
Absolutely! The self-paced format allows you to learn at your own convenience, even with a busy schedule. You can dedicate as much or as little time as you can manage.

There's no one-size-fits-all pace for completing the course. We recommend setting a realistic schedule that works for you. Some factors that can influence pace include prior knowledge, learning style, and time commitment.

The course completion time can be affected by several factors, such as your learning speed, prior experience, and the amount of time you dedicate to studying each day. The assignments also play a role, and the complexity of each one can influence the overall duration.

The time it takes to complete the assignments varies depending on their nature. Some might be quick quizzes, while others might require more in-depth research and writing. We don't have a specific timeframe, but we'll provide clear instructions and estimated timeframes for each assignment.

The {course_name} course is priced at {course_price}. We believe it offers excellent value for the knowledge and skills you'll gain.
Yes, there is a fee to enroll in this course. The cost is {course_price}.
We occasionally offer discounts and promotions. You can check our website or subscribe to our newsletter for updates on any current offers.
We offer several payment options for your convenience. You can find all the details on the enrollment page.
The course price includes access to all course materials, video lectures, quizzes, and assignments. You'll also have access to instructor support for a specific duration.
Unfortunately, we don't currently offer a free trial for this course. However, we do provide a detailed course outline and sample lessons to give you a better idea of the content.

The value of the course depends on your individual goals and learning style. We encourage you to review the course curriculum and learning objectives to see if it aligns with your needs. Here are some of the skills you'll gain...

It's difficult to make a direct comparison without considering the specific content and features of other courses. However, we believe {course_name} offers a comprehensive and valuable learning experience at a competitive price.

responses: Absolutely! We're here to help you through any challenges you encounter. Can you tell me a bit more about what you're stuck on with {concept/topic}?
No problem, let's see if we can clarify {specific part of the lesson}. Can you describe what aspects you find confusing?
Yes, we have a dedicated support system in place to assist you. You can access it through the course platform or by contacting our support team directly.
If you get stuck on a concept, there are several ways to get help. You can review the course materials again, consult the FAQs, or reach out to our support team for further assistance.

We offer various support options for students in this course, including access to course forums, instructor Q&A sessions, and dedicated support staff. You can find more details on the course platform.
Sure, I can definitely help clarify {specific question about the material}. Here's a more detailed explanation...
Yes, we have a dedicated course forum where you can connect with other students, discuss the material, and ask questions. You can access it through the course platform.
For assignment-related questions, the best way to get help is to contact your instructor directly. You can find their contact information within the course platform.
I understand you're facing a technical issue related to {technical issue}. We can help! Can you provide more details about the problem you're experiencing?

We appreciate you reporting a bug! To ensure a prompt resolution, please submit a detailed bug report through the course platform. This will help our technical team investigate and fix the issue as soon as possible.

patterns: Does this course help with job placement?

responses: This course can definitely help you on your job search journey by equipping you with valuable skills and knowledge in {topic area}. By strengthening your resume and demonstrating your capabilities, you'll be more prepared to impress potential employers.

Yes, this course can increase your employability in the {field} field. By acquiring the skills and knowledge covered in the course, you'll become a more competitive candidate for relevant job openings.
Absolutely! Completing this course can open doors to various career opportunities in {list of relevant job titles}. The skills you gain will be highly sought-after by employers in this field.
After taking this course, you'll be qualified for positions such as {list of relevant job titles}. The specific opportunities will depend on your experience and career goals.

This course will equip you with the knowledge and practical skills to confidently approach job interviews. You'll gain a strong understanding of key concepts in {topic area}, allowing you to effectively demonstrate your expertise during interviews.

While we don't directly offer career counseling or job placement services, the course can significantly enhance your resume and prepare you for the job search process. We recommend exploring job boards and career resources relevant to your field of study.

We can't disclose specific companies, but graduates with skills in {relevant skills} are in high demand across various industries. This course will prepare you to compete for positions in companies that value these skills.

Completing this course can open doors to various career paths in {list of career paths}. You can explore opportunities in {specific examples} or leverage your newfound skills to pursue other positions within the {field} field.

This course can help you advance in your career by providing you with in-demand skills and industry knowledge in {topic area}. By upskilling yourself, you'll become a more valuable asset to your current employer or stand out to potential employers you're targeting.

If you're interested in a career in {field}, this course is definitely relevant. It covers the core fundamentals and practical skills highly sought-after in this field. By completing the course, you'll gain a strong foundation to launch your career in {field}.

patterns: How does this course compare to {other_course_name}?

On the other hand, {course_name2} focuses on {summary of course2 content} and is {difficulty level}. Let me know if you'd like more details on a specific aspect of these courses.

The key differences between {course_name1} and {course_name2} lie in their focus and target audience. {course_name1} is designed for {target audience of course1} and emphasizes {key focus of course1}, while {course_name2} caters to {target audience of course2} with a focus on {key focus of course2}. Consider your background and learning objectives to make an informed choice.

Sure, let's explore the differences between {course_name1} and {course_name2}. {course_name1} offers {summary of course1 content}, while {course_name2} delves deeper into {summary of course2 content}. {course_name1} might be suitable if you prefer a broader overview, while {course_name2} caters to those seeking a more in-depth exploration.
If you're interested in {topic}, we offer a few courses! {List course options briefly}. Can you elaborate on your area of interest within {topic} to help me recommend the most suitable course?

This course is designed for beginners, whereas {other_course_name} might require some prior knowledge in {related topic}. However, {other_course_name} offers a more comprehensive approach to {topic} if you have the foundation.

To determine which course covers {specific_topic} in more depth, {course_name1} focuses on {course1's approach to specific topic}, while {course_name2} dives deeper into {course2's approach to specific topic}. Consider which approach aligns better with your learning goals.

The course duration doesn't necessarily reflect the comprehensiveness. {course_name1} might cover the same core material as this course in a more concise way, focusing on the essentials. This course offers a more in-depth exploration of {specific aspects covered in this course that might not be in course1}.

If you have some experience in {topic}, {course_name2} might be a better fit. It delves deeper into concepts and requires a solid foundation. {course_name1} could be a good refresher or introduction if you're looking for a broader overview before diving deeper.

patterns: Do you offer a money-back guarantee for this course?

responses: Yes, we offer a {money-back guarantee duration} money-back guarantee for this course. If you're not completely satisfied within that timeframe, you can request a full refund.
Our refund policy allows you to request a full refund within {money-back guarantee duration} of enrolling in the course. You can find more details about the policy on our course enrollment page.
Absolutely! If you're not satisfied with the course within {money-back guarantee duration}, you can request a full refund. We want you to be confident in your learning investment.
No worries! If you decide this course isn't the right fit for you within {money-back guarantee duration}, you can easily request a refund through our platform.
We don't currently offer a risk-free trial, but we do have a {money-back guarantee duration} money-back guarantee that allows you to try the course risk-free for that period.
You have {money-back guarantee duration} from the date of enrollment to request a refund. Be sure to review our refund policy for any specific timelines or requirements.

To be eligible for a refund, you'll need to request it within {money-back guarantee duration} and meet any other criteria outlined in our refund policy, such as not completing a certain percentage of the course material. You can find the full details on our course enrollment page.

Sure, the money-back guarantee ensures you can try the course risk-free for {money-back guarantee duration}. If you're not satisfied with the content or delivery within that timeframe, you'll be eligible for a full refund. Let me know if you'd like to know more about the refund process.

We update the course content regularly to reflect industry changes. Additionally, we provide resources throughout the course that will help you stay updated on the latest trends and developments in {topic area}. You can also explore industry publications and online communities to stay informed.

Absolutely! After completing the course, we recommend following industry publications, attending webinars, and participating in online communities related to {topic}. This will allow you to stay current on the latest trends and innovations in the field.

patterns: What are the prerequisites for a Data Structures and Algorithms course?
Do I need to know anything before taking a data structures course?
What programming languages do I need to know for DSA?
Is there anything else I should learn before starting a DSA course?
What basic math skills are required for data structures and algorithms?
I'm weak in {programming_concept}, would this be a problem for DSA?
Can I learn data structures and algorithms without any programming experience?
responses: A basic understanding of at least one programming language is essential for a Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) course. This will allow you to implement and understand the data structures and algorithms covered in the course. Popular choices include Python, Java, or C++.

No prior knowledge is absolutely required, but some familiarity with programming concepts like variables, data types, loops, and conditional statements would be beneficial. This will give you a foundation for understanding how data structures and algorithms are implemented in code.

While you don't need to be a master programmer, a basic understanding of one programming language like Python, Java, or C++ is crucial for DSA. In these courses, you'll learn how to code the data structures and algorithms you're studying.

Absolutely! Before diving into DSA, some foundational knowledge in computer science concepts like complexity analysis and problem-solving techniques can be helpful. These concepts will give you a better grasp of how to analyze and compare different algorithms.

A solid understanding of basic math concepts like algebra and logic will be beneficial for DSA. These skills are used in analyzing algorithms, understanding time and space complexity, and manipulating data structures efficiently.

If you're weak in {programming_concept}, it might be helpful to brush up on those concepts before starting a DSA course. However, most DSA courses will cover the necessary programming fundamentals alongside the data structures and algorithms. Don't let it discourage you from starting!

While it's ideal to have some programming experience, it's not absolutely necessary for beginner-level DSA courses. Some courses might offer an intro to programming alongside DSA concepts. However, having a basic understanding of programming fundamentals will definitely give you a head start.

patterns: What kind of salary can I expect with a data science background?
How much can I earn as a data scientist?

Is data science a high-paying field?

What are the salary ranges for data science jobs?
How does data science salary compare to other tech careers?

Is it possible to make a six-figure salary in data science?
responses: Data science is a high-paying field with a strong earning potential. According to [source], the median salary for data scientists in the US is [median salary amount] as of [date]. This can vary depending on several factors.

Yes, data science can lead to a good income. The salary range can vary depending on your experience, location, industry, and specific job title. But overall, data scientists are well-compensated for their skills and expertise.

The earning potential in data science is quite promising. Entry-level data scientists can expect to earn around [entry-level salary range], while experienced professionals can command salaries exceeding [experienced professional salary range].

Absolutely! Data science is one of the most sought-after tech skills, and this translates to high earning potential. The demand for skilled data scientists continues to grow, and salaries reflect that.
Yes, a data science career can definitely lead to a good income. With the right skills and experience, you can expect to earn a competitive salary that allows for a comfortable lifestyle.
Salary ranges for data science jobs can vary depending on location, industry, and experience level. You can find more specific information on salary websites like [salary website suggestion].

Data science salaries tend to be higher than many other tech careers. The specific comparison depends on the role, but data science skills are generally in high demand, which is reflected in the compensation.

Several factors can affect a data scientist's salary, including experience, location, industry, specific job title, and the company you work for. Additionally, your skills, certifications, and educational background can also play a role.

With {number} years of experience in data science, you can expect a salary range of approximately [salary range based on experience] depending on the factors mentioned earlier.  You can refine this estimate by considering your location, industry, and specific skills.

Yes, making a six-figure salary in data science is definitely possible, especially with experience and advanced skills. As you progress in your career and take on more senior roles, your earning potential can significantly increase.

responses: We currently don't offer financial aid or scholarships directly for this course. However, you might be able to find relevant scholarship opportunities through external organizations. Would you like me to help you search for some resources?

Unfortunately, we don't have scholarships available specifically for this course at this time. However, we encourage you to explore external scholarship opportunities that might align with your field of study or background.

We understand that financial constraints can be a hurdle. While we don't offer financial aid directly, we can recommend some resources that might help you find scholarships or grants. Would you be interested in that?

There aren't any specific financial assistance programs for this course at the moment. However, we can explore some alternative options. Are you open to exploring payment plans or finding external scholarships?

We can't directly offer financial aid for this course, but the application process typically involves submitting a financial aid application and meeting eligibility requirements.  Unfortunately, we don't manage that process ourselves. However, you can check the course enrollment page for any relevant information or contact the financial aid office for more details.

I understand that the course fee might be a challenge. We don't have financial aid available at this time, but we do offer installment plans as a payment option. You can also explore external scholarship opportunities to help cover the cost.

We understand that the full price might not be feasible for everyone. While we don't have financial aid options directly, we do offer installment plans that can help you spread the cost over time. Additionally, you can search for external scholarships that might provide financial assistance.

patterns: What kind of certificate do I get after completing this course?
Will I receive a certificate for this course?
Is there a certificate of completion for this course?
What does the course certificate look like?
How long does it take to get the certificate after finishing the course?
Can I get a digital copy of the certificate?
What can I do with the certificate after completing the course?
Is the certificate recognized by any institutions?
responses: Upon successful completion of this course, you'll earn a {certificate type} (e.g., course completion certificate, certificate of achievement) that recognizes your accomplishment.
Yes, you'll receive a certificate of completion after successfully finishing this course. The certificate acknowledges your effort and the skills you've gained.
Absolutely! We award a certificate of completion to students who successfully complete the course requirements.

We don't currently share a preview of the certificate. However, it will be a professional-looking document that acknowledges your course completion and details the course name, your name, and the date of completion.
The time it takes to receive your certificate after finishing the course can vary depending on the platform. It typically takes {timeframe} after meeting all course requirements.
Yes, we offer both printed and digital copies of the certificate. You can choose your preferred format during the course completion process.

Your course certificate serves as a valuable credential that demonstrates your acquired knowledge and skills in {course topic} to potential employers or educational institutions. You can include it in your resume or portfolio.

The recognition of the certificate depends on the issuing institution and the specific course. While we can't guarantee external recognition, our certificates are well-respected within the {industry/field} and valued by employers who appreciate the skills covered in this course.

patterns: What do other students say about this course?

Are there testimonials available for this course?

I'd like to know what other people's experiences were like.
responses: Absolutely! We have testimonials from previous students who share their experiences with the course. You can find them on our course webpage under the 'Testimonials' section.

Yes, we encourage you to read reviews from past students! They offer valuable insights into their learning experience and the course's overall quality. You can find them on the course enrollment page.
Sure, we have testimonials on our website from students who have completed this course. These testimonials can help you get a better sense of what the course is like and the value it provides.
We showcase testimonials from past students on our course platform. Reading through these experiences can give you valuable insights from those who have already taken the course.

Sure, understanding other students' experiences can be helpful! We have a dedicated section for testimonials on the course webpage.  This will allow you to hear firsthand about what others gained from the course.

responses: This course doesn't currently include a dedicated mentor. However, we offer a variety of resources for support, such as {list of support resources, e.g., discussion forums, instructor Q&A sessions, course community}.

We don't offer one-on-one mentorship for this course, but we have a vibrant course community where you can connect with instructors, teaching assistants, and other students. You can also ask questions in the discussion forums and get help from peers.

Unfortunately, mentor assignment isn't available for this specific course. However, our instructors are actively involved in the course discussions and can provide guidance throughout your learning journey.

While we don't have a formal mentor program, we offer instructor support through Q&A sessions and discussions within the course platform. You can also connect with other students and learn from their experiences.

This course doesn't include a dedicated mentor, but we provide a supportive learning environment. You can connect with instructors and fellow students through discussion forums, ask questions, and get help from the course community.

responses: This course is currently offered entirely online. You can access the course materials, lectures, and assignments from a convenient online platform at your own pace.
Unfortunately, this course isn't available in a traditional in-person classroom setting at this time. However, the online format offers flexibility and allows you to learn from anywhere.
We don't currently offer a classroom setting for this course. It's designed as an online program that provides a flexible and accessible learning experience.
Yes, this course is available entirely online! You'll benefit from the convenience of learning from anywhere at your own pace.
No, this course is delivered entirely online. The online format offers a flexible and self-paced learning experience.
